thread.title: The 2018 Mercedes-AMG E63 S wagon is the family car you really want
thread.title_full: The 2018 Mercedes-AMG E63 S wagon is the family car you really want

author: Andrew Ganz (feedback@highgearmedia.com)
title: The 2018 Mercedes-AMG E63 S wagon is the family car you really want
text: With more than 600 horsepower on tap, the 2018 Mercedes-AMG E63 S station wagon may very well represent the most entertaining way to haul your family around. To say that it's nothing like the Buick Centurys and FordCountry Squires that once dominated suburbia is certainly an understatement. The E-Class AMG wagon has become something of a legend in...
